ISSUE.TITLE: Remove information about ShipStation plugin from the admin tour
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 We removed the ShipStation plugin from the out of the box configuration and from the documentation, so we need to remove the information from the admin tour as well

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6810 App settings page. Fixed a hyperlink to our documentation

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6814 Removed information about ShipStation plugin from the admin tour
